scripts.pulumi:up: tsgo -b && PULUMI_CONFIG_PASSPHRASE="" pulumi up --stack production && pnpm pulumi:config:hosts
scripts.config:ssh-key: bash -c 'KEY=$(PULUMI_CONFIG_PASSPHRASE="" pulumi stack output sshPrivateKey --show-secrets | sed "s/^[[:space:]]*//;s/[[:space:]]*$//") && HOST=$(PULUMI_CONFIG_PASSPHRASE="" pulumi stack output serverIp) && echo "$KEY" > ~/.ssh/tg-discord && chmod 600 ~/.ssh/tg-discord && echo "" && echo "=== GitHub Actions Secrets ==" && echo "" && echo "Update these secrets at: Settings → Secrets and variables → Actions" && echo "" && echo "SSH_HOST:" && echo "$HOST" && echo "" && echo "SSH_PRIVATE_KEY:" && echo "$KEY" && echo "" && echo "Local key saved to: ~/.ssh/tg-discord" && echo "Connect with: ssh -i ~/.ssh/tg-discord root@$HOST"'
